subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Famer Juli Inkster shot a five-under-par 66 to finish the second round tied for the lead with Shi Hyun Ahn in the Canadian Women’s Open. The 47-year-old Inkster matched Ahn (67) at eight-under 134 on the Royal Mayfair course in Edmonton, Alberta. Michelle Wie, who has been slowed by wrist injuries, shot a 74 and missed the cut with a 149 total.
